text:
Hey there RealLifers! If you are big fans 
of mystery stories today's lesson is just

right for you. In today's lesson we are going 
to learn English with Sam and Dean from the

successful show Supernatural.
But before we get into it,

in case you're new here, did you know that 
we make lessons every week just like this one

to help you learn English without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

Just like Siti who says that our channel is the 
best way to learn and improve your English skills

and they now never miss the 
joke while learning here.

Did you know that with the RealLife App you'll 
be able to connect to other English learners

from around the world and practice your 
speaking while discovering other cultures

in fun dynamic short conversations?
You can also practice your listening

skills with our podcast and follow along with the 
transcript, so that you learn all the vocabulary.

The best part it's absolutely FREE, so 
download it now by clicking up here or

the link down in the description.
Or just search RealLife English in

the Apple App or Google Playstore.
I look forward to seeing you there!

I hope you've had a great time learning 
English with Supernatural today

and if you're a big fan of fantasy shows 
I highly recommend that you take a look at
this lesson we made with The Vampire Diaries next!
